Title: For Your Eyes Only
Writer: Richard Maibaum (screenplay by), Michael G. Wilson (screenplay by)
Actors: Roger Moore, Carole Bouquet, Topol, Lynn-Holly Johnson
Plot: James Bond is assigned to find a missing British vessel, equipped with a weapons encryption device and prevent it from falling into enemy hands.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 4 nominations.
